sentences.sentence: Pluralities of projections are disposed on the active surface.
sentences.translation: 复数个凸块是设置于该主动面。

sentences.sentence: In nearly half of the countries surveyed, majorities or pluralities see parents applying too little pressure on students.
sentences.translation: 在调查中近一半的国家中，大多数人表示父母给孩子压力太小。

sentences.sentence: It causes not only horror realities, but also the destruction of all pluralities and spontaneous activities of human life.
sentences.translation: 它所造成的不仅是恐怖现实，而是对于人类生活生活中全部多样化、自发性系统的毁灭。
